```{r}
fish_weight <- function(a, b, L) {
  W = a * (L^b)
}

(milkfish <- fish_weight(a = 0.905, b = 2.52, L = 60))

(trevally <- fish_weight(a = 0.0353, b = 3.05, L = 60))

(barracuda <- fish_weight(a = 0.0181, b = 3.27, L = 60))
```

```{r}
fish_length <- seq(from = 0, to = 200, by = 1)

(barracuda_weight <- fish_weight(a = 0.0181, b = 3.27, L = fish_length))

fish_data <- data.frame(fish_length, barracuda_weight)

ggplot(data = fish_data, aes(x = fish_length, y = barracuda_weight)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Fish Lengths (centimeters)",
       y = "Barracuda Weight (g)",
       title = "Barracuda  weight with Respect to Fish Length")




```
